name: Shrimp Macaroni Salad
author: Renee Coley
summary: My mom made this shrimp macaroni salad one day for a picnic and it was such a hit, there were no leftovers and we have been making it ever since. I have even omitted the shrimp at times due to allergies of our guests and it is still everyone's favorite.
ingredients: 1 pound cooked and peeled medium shrimp
½ cup sliced pitted green olives  (Optional)
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes
Mix macaroni, shrimp, tomatoes, olives, and green onions together in a large bowl
Combine lemon juice, oil, garlic, salt, and pepper for dressing in a separate bowl or mixing glass
Pour dressing over salad and refrigerate for at least 4 hours
